After lavish wedding celebrations in Italy, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh will return to India on November 18th. The couple got married in a Konkani ceremony held on November 14 and a Sindhi ceremony on November 15.
The celebrations were perfect in every sense of the word and the pictures and videos that made way on the internet prove that the team definitely did a great job at putting it all together.
Just like their private wedding celebrations in Italy, the couple will be hosting three receptions-two in Mumbai and one in Bengaluru for their friends from the fraternity and other family members.
instagram/Ranveer Singh
The couple will meet and greet the media and that reception will be held on November 28 and it will be followed by a grand reception for their fraternity friends on December 1.

To welcome the newly-weds and especially Deepika, the residence of Ranveer Singh has been decorated and given a special makeover. According to pictures posted by ANI, the residence has been all decked up with beautiful lights.
Mumbai: Earlier visuals from outside the residence of Ranveer Singh. He tied the knot with Deepika Padukone in a two-day function on November 14-15 in Italy's Lombardy at Villa del Balbianello at Lake Como. pic.twitter.com/yzOvvL4Rqx — ANI (@ANI) November 15, 2018
With Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh completing their two-day nuptials in a location overlooking the picturesque Lake Como in Italy, Ranveer's Mumbai residence has been decked up with serial lights & flowers to welcome the newlyweds
